pyqgis_plugin.name: GeoMiningOpt
pyqgis_plugin.description: Mineral exploration using Google Earth Engine with multi-sensor support (Sentinel-2, Sentinel-1, Landsat 8/9)
pyqgis_plugin.about: GeoMiningOpt is a professional QGIS plugin for mineral exploration that leverages Google Earth Engine for server-side processing. It supports multiple satellite sensors (Sentinel-2, Sentinel-1, Landsat 8/9) with standard spectral processing, unsupervised clustering for mineral zone detection, and generates professional cartographic outputs. Optimized for low-memory systems.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: M.Sc. Edwin Calle Condori Founder & CEO – Geonorthi
pyqgis_plugin.uploaded_by: M.Sc. Edwin Calle Condori Founder & CEO – Geonorth
